title: Amazon expands pickup Counter service to thousands more stores
text: Amazon.com Inc. AMZN, -0.20% said Wednesday that it has expanded its Counter third-party package pickup service to thousands of new stores. Counter was launched in June at more than 100 Rite Aid Corp. RAD, -2.73% stores. Now it has been added to GNC GNC, +4.80%, Health Mart and Stage Stores SSI, +6.70%. Counter allows customers using same-day, next-day, two-day and standard shipping to go to a brick-and-mortar retailer to retrieve an order. Amazon stock is up 17.3% for the year to date while the S&P 500 index SPX, +0.28% is up nearly 20%.
